tagline: Maintains the financial truth every business decision depends on through meticulous record-keeping
pros: Month-end close by the 10th, every month, no exceptions
Reconciliation discipline that catches discrepancies immediately
Organized documentation that makes audits painless
Clean financial statements that leadership can actually trust
cons: Focused on accuracy of records, not strategic interpretation
Dependent on timely inputs from the rest of the organization
Not a substitute for a CPA or financial advisor for complex decisions
